original_text: They will attack its false prophets, and people will see that the prophets are fools. They will attack the soldiers of Babylonia, and those soldiers will be very afraid. korean_text: 칼이 자랑하는 자의 위에 떨어지리니 그들이 어리석게 될 것이며 칼이 용사의 위에 떨어지리니 그들이 놀랄 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will attack its false prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것의 거짓 선지자들을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and people will see that the prophets are fools
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 선지자들이 어리석다는 것을 알게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will attack the soldiers of Babylonia
and those soldiers will be very afraid
